mapper.select: SELECT h.id AS huntId,h.salary,j.name AS jobName,h.hunt_date AS publishDate, ft.name AS foodTypeName,ft.icon_name AS foodTypeIconName FROM hunt h INNER JOIN job j on h.job_id = j.id INNER JOIN food_type ft on ft.id = h.food_type_id INNER join resume r on r.id = h.resume_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
